summary: This document is an email correspondence discussing a meeting scheduled at Jeffrey Epstein's home. Amanda Kirby confirms the availability of her team and mentions attendees from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management, including Caroline Kitidis and Tazia Smith.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting and confirming availability for her team to meet at Jeffrey Epstein's home.

persons.name: Lesley
persons.context: Lesley is the person who is being asked to confirm the meeting details with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Paul is mentioned as bringing two attendees to the meeting, indicating his involvement in the planning.

persons.name: Caroline Kitidis
persons.context: Caroline Kitidis is identified as the Head of the Key Clients Partners Group and will be attending the meeting.

persons.name: Tazia Smith
persons.context: Tazia Smith is mentioned as a Director in the Key Clients Partners Group and will also be attending the meeting.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting with Lesley, indicating a professional relationship.

Paul is bringing Tazia Smith to the meeting, indicating a professional connection.

events.title: Meeting at Jeffrey Epstein's Home
events.description: A meeting is scheduled to take place at Jeffrey Epstein's home with various attendees from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management.

keyFacts: A meeting is scheduled for September 6, 2013, at Jeffrey Epstein's home.
Amanda Kirby is coordinating the meeting and confirming attendance.
Paul will bring Caroline Kitidis and Tazia Smith to the meeting.
Caroline Kitidis is the Head of the Key Clients Partners Group.
Tazia Smith is a Director in the Key Clients Partners Group.
